text: The men's 800 metres event at the 1979 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 24 and 25 February in Vienna.ResultsResults (p. 475) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Antonio Páez '''' |Binko Kolev '''' |András Paróczai '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 from each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
